metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4344 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Jenkins Core in Jenkins before 1.438, and 1.409 LTS before 1.409.3 LTS, when a stand-alone container is used, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to error messages.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjenkins-winstone-java - 0.9.10-jenkins-47+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jenkins-winstone package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.10-jenkins-47+dfsg-1').
